programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Never Say Xever - Leo fears his act of mercy has come back to haunt him when Xever holds a local noodle shop owner hostage.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep112
programme.desc: It Came from the Depths - Michelangelo befriends an unstable mutant alligator who possesses a strange piece of Kraang technology, but the other Turtles aren't sure whether Leatherhead is a friend or a foe.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Cockroach Terminator - As the Turtles try to foil a Kraang invasion plot, they are hunted by a giant, indestructible cockroach.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep160
programme.desc: Patrick's Staycation / Walking The Plankton - Patrick takes a break from the hustle and bustle of his daily life with some over-the-top pampering from SpongeBob. // When Karen and Plankton see Mr. Krabs on the same cruise, Plankton starts wondering who's minding the Krabby Patty secret formula.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep161
programme.desc: Mooncation / Mr. Krabs Takes a Vacation - Sandy only wanted to spend a relaxing vacation alone on the moon. But it seems she's got a stowaway aboard her rocket who doesn't share her idea. // On his trip to the Ocean Mint, Mr. Krabs learns that old money is shredded and burned.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep163
programme.desc: Mermaidman Begins / Plankton's Good Eye - Mermaidman and Barnacleboy let SpongeBob and Patrick in on their secret, heroic origins! // Using SpongeBob's DNA, Plantkon grows himself a second eye...and becomes nice!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep233
programme.desc: Krusty Kleaners - After spilling a milkshake during a delivery, SpongeBob vows to return and clean the entire building!

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep111
programme.desc: Hashtag Oops - Twitch helps Hashtag choose her alt-mode, and it takes them both for a wild and G.H.O.S.T.-ly ride that Bumblebee must help them escape.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Late for Breakfast / Bummer Jobs - Patrick presents a show about food after missing out on a hearty breakfast. // Patrick and SpongeBob experience the wonders of the workforce.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep212
programme.desc: The Star Smurf/Baby Sensei - When nobody wants to listen to Harmony's dreadful music, Papa Smurf gives him a potion to charm his audience. // Smurfette and her class of Smurf-Fu students mistake Baby as their Smurf-Fu guru.

programme.title: The Smurfs S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Magic Pumpkin/Lost Cat - On Halloween, Smurfette gives Wimpy a magic pumpkin to help him scare the other Smurfs. // When Azrael gets injured in the forest, Wild brings the cat to the Smurfs' village to heal

programme.title: The Smurfs S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Who Nose? / Clumsy Not Clumsy - Hefty casts a spell which accidentally turns him into a colossal nose that sucks up everything in its path! // After catching Clumsy, Gargamel tempts him with a magic amulet that makes his clumsiness disappear.

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Case of the Moon-Days / Portrait of a Monster - In order to evade Monster Hunters, Clawdeen must accept who she is to save herself and Cleo. // Frankie's identity crisis during picture days causes her to ZAP a camera into a live, soulsucking menace.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep153
programme.desc: Accidents Will Happen / The Other Patty - When Squidward gets hurt at work, he threatens legal action unless Mr. Krabs caters to him hand and foot. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton may finally agree on something, when the popular "Flabby Patty" restaurant threatens to steal their customers!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin the Bottle / There's a Sponge in My Soup - Plankton poses as a wish-granting genie in his latest scheme to get the secret formula. // Mr. Krabs' new Krabby soup is a hit - until some heat-loving hippies move into the soup vat!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep219
programme.desc: Man Ray Returns / Larry the Floor Manager - When Man Ray rents Squidward's house for the weekend, it's up to SpongeBob and Patrick to stop his evil vacation! // Mr. Krabs takes a vacation and makes Larry the Lobster the temporary manager of the Krusty Krab.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Squawk in the Name of Love / Date with Destiny - Sergio enlists Adelaide's help to become a gentleman in order to win Priscilla back! // Rosa hears an Ernesto Estrella prediction that Maria and Arturo could get back together - could it be true?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep304
programme.desc: Skaters Gonna Hate / Born to Be Mild - Ronnie Anne and her pals enlist Carlos X as their coach in a skate-off against Tony Hawk! // Tired of the bullies at school, Alexis learns the tough guy ropes from Carl.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep218
programme.desc: Spin Off - After seeing CJ's awesome spin moves, Par helps CJ enter and train for a sign spinning competition!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep254
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 1 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep255
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 2 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep111
programme.desc: X Marks the Pot / Patrick's Alley - A classic villain returns to his former lair, only to find the Star Family inhabiting it. // The Patrick Show rebrands for a younger audience.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pearl Wants to Be a Star / Super Sitters - Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show. // Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Snooze Pods / Sticky Vicky - Jasper becomes trapped in a dream using one of Schwoz's Snooze Pods. It's up to Captain Man & Kid Danger to bring him back. // Henry's field trip to the Museum of Celebrity Garbage is cut short by the arrival of Sticky Vicky.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Popcorn Monster / Game of Drones - While trying to create two identical pieces of popcorn Ray and Henry accidentally bring to life the Popcorn Monster. // To help Ray win the Swellview Drone Dash, Schwoz hatches a plan: shrink Kid Danger & have him pilot his own drone.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep255
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Big Birthday Blowout Part 2 - SpongeBob and Patrick tour the surface world, while the rest of Bikini Bottom prepares a surprise for SpongeBob!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep230
programme.desc: Bottle Burglars - When SpongeBob and Squidward accidentally let Plankton steal the secret formula, it's up to them to steal it back!

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep407
programme.desc: Tour Bus / Game Show - When Alvin talks Dave into buying a used tour bus, Dave has no idea of the problems ahead. // Alvin signs the Chipmunks up for a game show that forces losing contestants to perform dangerous stunts.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep408
programme.desc: Alvin Management / Time Capsule - When Alvin accuses Dave of yelling at him too much a therapist moves in to help Dave control his anger. // When the school digs up an old high school time capsule, Miss Smith and Dave work together to keep an old secret.

programme.title: The Adventures of Kid Danger S01 Ep101
programme.desc: Popcorn Monster / Game of Drones - While trying to create two identical pieces of popcorn Ray and Henry accidentally bring to life the Popcorn Monster. // To help Ray win the Swellview Drone Dash, Schwoz hatches a plan: shrink Kid Danger & have him pilot his own drone.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S03 Ep311
programme.desc: The Pig and the Rhino - Donnie finishes a new batch of retro-mutagen, hoping to save Karai, but the Turtles find themselves hunted by Shredder's new vengeful henchmen. Bebop and Rocksteady!

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep111
programme.desc: TNT-Midi / Poltergoose - SwaySway and Buhdeuce accidentally deliver Spicy Dynamite Bread to T-Midi, and now they have to fix up their mix up. // The rocket van gets possessed by a Poltergoose, who turns out to be a real pain in the beak.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep111
programme.desc: I Will Survive - Our gang reaches the lair of Alvin the demon but must conquer a series of obstacles before they can get to Brendar's brother. They dance, solve riddles, and defeat a monster, when finally Brendar reaches her brother named Kendar.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep126
programme.desc: Dorg and the Magicals - As the Magicals track down an alien substance for RD, General Gratch and his scientists arrive in Normill, also on the hunt for something magical... // Time is running out for Dorg and the Magicals to find the rare Numpty Newt!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Loch Mess Monster / Might Meow and Super Lucha - Miguel is so messy that a creature named the Loch Mess Monster moves in with him. // Felicity and Miguel pretend to be real super heroes, drawing the wrath of a notorious super villain named The Couch Potato.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Laked Nake / Doom Baby - The dudes' decision to babysit Richard Dickson might cost Craig his life. // A good day at the lake goes bad when Sanjay loses his bathing suit.

programme.title: Corn & Peg S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Dinosaur Do-Good / Legend of Bighoof - It's up to the do-gooders observe and compare a lost baby dinosaur's traits in order to reunite him with his mother. // Corn and Peg stumble upon the legendary 'Bighoof'! programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep120
programme.desc: West Coast ended a 16 game losing streak beating North Melbourne in Perth last week. The Eagles travel to Melbourne to face the Bombers after Essendon lost a close one to Sydney. A must-win for Essendon as they fell to 13th.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep121
programme.desc: Collingwood remain two games clear on top of the ladder despite a 17 point loss to Carlton. With 16 wins this year the Magpies are the benchmark, with young gun Nick Daicos. In Round 21 the Magpies face Hawthorn who sit 16th.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep122
programme.desc: Two losses have seen Geelong fall outside the Top 8. In a Saturday Night Blockbuster can the Cats resurrect their Premiership defence as they host Port Adelaide? The Power remain in 2nd spot but have lost three in a row.

programme.desc: Thousands of statues stolen from temples across Cambodia and sold to collectors and museums are being tracked down as part of a global treasure hunt. The inside story of how several stolen antiquities ended up in Australia.

programme.title: Paramedics Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Mark and Carina race to save a young woman struggling to breathe from an asthma attack. Matt airlifts a trauma patient to hospital after a horror car crash. Taz and Amanda find a fun way of deciding who drives the ambulance.

programme.desc: Lost at sea?; Seven's World Cup snub; Barbie mania; Tele's dead body shock.

programme.desc: Innes Willox, Chief Executive of the national employer association Australian Industry Group addresses the Press Club on "Industrial Relations 'Reform' - the risks of unjustified changes and the need for a better approach".

programme.desc: The Matildas advance to the knockout stage at the Women's World Cup after a 4-0 win over Olympic champions Canada. Australia retain the Ashes after the series ends 2-2, plus the Netball World Cup, the Wallabies, AFL and NRL.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes are joined by Wallaroo Sera Naiqama and former Rugby League international Tinirau 'T' Arona, as they round up an exciting week of Pacific sport highlights.

programme.title: Ticket To The Cup Ep13
programme.desc: Tracey Holmes sits down with the most powerful woman in world sport. Fatma Samoura is the Secretary General of FIFA and is the first woman, the first person of colour, and the first Muslim ever to be appointed to the role.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep7
programme.desc: Johnson Raela speaks to Cook Island Prime Minister Mark Brown, we demystify the complexities around proposed deep sea mining, and reporter Marian Kupu catches up with Pacific players at the Netball World Cup in Cape Town.

programme.desc: Melbourne have won four in a row and are level with Brisbane on points for 3rd spot. After a surging win over the Tigers can the Demons beat North Melbourne in Hobart, Tasmania? The Demons have a chance at claiming 2nd spot.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep30
programme.desc: The Matildas advance to the knockout stage at the Women's World Cup after a 4-0 win over Olympic champions Canada. Australia retain the Ashes after the series ends 2-2, plus the Netball World Cup, the Wallabies, AFL and NRL.

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep124
programme.desc: Round 21 concludes with the Dockers hosting Brisbane. The Lions sit in 3rd spot one win behind Port in 2nd. After four straight losses Fremantle upset Geelong to keep their slim finals prospects alive, now 2 wins behind 8th.

programme.title: Back Roads Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 9 - Heather visits the sleepy Victorian mountainside town of Walhalla, on the historic Goldfields Railway. Frozen in time, with movie-set looks, a cricket pitch that defies logic, and nearby creatures straight from the Dreamtime.

programme.title: Our Law Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - First Nation cadets Leroy, Hannah and Shaye set out to try to bridge the gap between Indigenous communities and the police. Their training at the WA Police Academy involves rigorous physical and academic trials.

programme.title: Mystery Road: Origin Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The Kelly Gang's plans violently come to a head in a shootout at the Roadhouse. Mary gets too close to Josh's killers and Jay finds out who was really behind his father's death. (Final)

programme.title: The China Century Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - After 150 years of British occupation, Hong Kong was returned to China in 1997. We examine how the territory has always been defined by the contest of influence between China and the West and how that tension plays out today.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep4

programme.title: Art Works Ep1

programme.desc: Sr. 4 - Musical comedy maestro Tim Minchin joins Anh to share his ascent from 'chubby and asthmatic' Perth boy to critical acclaim and box office success on the world stage. Can Anh capture his wit and intensity?

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC275TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: Whose titles were on the line at UFC 275 as Glover Teixeira faced Jiri Prochazka and Valentina Shevchenko took on Taila Santos. Plus, Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to face Zhang Weili in an epic rematch. See the main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian T-City Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFCs 145-pound title.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep8
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep1
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep7
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback Ep901UFC256FigueiredovsMoreno1
programme.desc: An enhanced replay of the sports biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from specialty cams.

programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: 2023 Motul TT Assen Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage Ep2321
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 291: Poirier vs. Gaethje 2
programme.desc: Prelims - The BMF title is up for grabs in the main event of UFC 291 on July 29, as Dustin Poirier and Justin Gaethje meet in a highly anticipated rematch at Delta Center in Utah where fireworks are not just expected, but mandatory when two of the best 155-pounders of this era collide. Plus, former champions meet when Alex Pereira makes his light heavyweight debut in a compelling matchup against the owner of Polish Power, Jan Blachowicz

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs Font
programme.desc: Prelims - A bantamweight bout between former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen and Umar Nurmagomedov was expected to headline the event. However, Nurmagomedov withdrew from the event in mid-July due to a shoulder injury. He was replaced by Rob Font in a catchweight bout of 140 pounds. The Ultimate Fighter: Team Joanna vs. Team Cludia women's strawweight winner Tatiana Suarez and Virna Jandiroba were scheduled to meet in a women's strawweight bout. However on June 20, it was announced that Jandiroba pulled out due to a knee injury and was replaced by former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion Jssica Andrade.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs Font
programme.desc: Main Event - A bantamweight bout between former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen and Umar Nurmagomedov was expected to headline the event. However, Nurmagomedov withdrew from the event in mid-July due to a shoulder injury. He was replaced by Rob Font in a catchweight bout of 140 pounds. The Ultimate Fighter: Team Joanna vs. Team Cludia women's strawweight winner Tatiana Suarez and Virna Jandiroba were scheduled to meet in a women's strawweight bout. However on June 20, it was announced that Jandiroba pulled out due to a knee injury and was replaced by former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion Jssica Andrade.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Sandhagen vs Font
programme.desc: Main Event - A bantamweight bout between former interim UFC Bantamweight Championship challenger Cory Sandhagen and Umar Nurmagomedov was expected to headline the event. However, Nurmagomedov withdrew from the event in mid-July due to a shoulder injury. He was replaced by Rob Font in a catchweight bout of 140 pounds. The Ultimate Fighter: Team Joanna vs. Team Cludia women's strawweight winner Tatiana Suarez and Virna Jandiroba were scheduled to meet in a women's strawweight bout. However on June 20, it was announced that Jandiroba pulled out due to a knee injury and was replaced by former UFC Women's Strawweight Champion Jssica Andrade.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC275TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: Whose titles were on the line at UFC 275 as Glover Teixeira faced Jiri Prochazka and Valentina Shevchenko took on Taila Santos. Plus, Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to face Zhang Weili in an epic rematch. See the main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep903VolkanovskivsOrtega
programme.desc: Undefeated in the UFC and reigning featherweight champion, Alexander Volkanovski defends his title against Jiu-Jitsu savant, Brian T-City Ortega at UFC 266. See both men train and prepare to fight for the UFCs 145-pound title.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep10
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep9
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.
